name: Boozetastic Broomsticks (vorpalhex)
description:
Built by Team NEKO CHONK for GMTK2020

You're Helena Morningstar, a renegade witch with a penchant for bets!

Your latest bet was that you could win a broom race. Unfortunately, you are not only hungover but also terrified of flying!

Luckily your good friends have helped you out by levitating some booze on the race course. Do your best to stay drunk enough to fly but sober enough to not blackout! Remember that as you drink more, your reflexes will get worse!

 Gameplay

+ Get to the end of the level before time runs out
+ Collect alcohol to fly faster, but watch out - your ability to steer will get worse!
+ If you get fully inebriated you'll black out and it's game over - don't get wasted!
